sentence.text: Empty spiracles homeobox 2 (regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) is a homeodomain-containing transcription factor that plays an essential role in tumorigenesis.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Overexpression of EMX2 significantly inhibited the proliferation in vitro and CRC tumor growth in establishment of mitotic spindle orientation mice.
